qa.name: Commander Sarah Chen
qa.appearance: Athletic build, with short black hair

hf.name: AI Assistant ARIA
hf.appearance: Holographic projection of a androgynous face

tr.name: Dr. Alex Novak
tr.appearance: Middle-aged with kind eyes and greying hair

json_to_edit.voice_over: In the vast emptiness of space, loneliness becomes your constant companion.
json_to_edit.description: Commander Sarah Chen grapples with isolation aboard the International Space Station.
json_to_edit.lighting: Harsh, artificial light with occasional Earth glow
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Soft hum of life support systems, occasional beeps
json_to_edit.name: Solitude in Orbit
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Commander Sarah Chen confronts her loneliness in space, interacting with AI ARIA and communicating with Earth.

qa.action: The International Space Station floating in the vast darkness of space, Earth visible in the background.

hf.action: Commander Chen floating in the observation module, staring out at Earth.

tr.action: Commander Chen's eyes, reflecting the blue glow of Earth, a tear forming in zero gravity.

xc.action: ARIA's holographic face materializing next to Commander Chen.

ka.action: Commander Chen and ARIA's hologram looking out at Earth together.

fn.action: Commander Chen's hands typing a message on a console.

af.action: Left: Commander Chen in the space station. Right: Dr. Novak at mission control, both engaged in a video call.

qo.action: Commander Chen performing maintenance on the station, floating gracefully in zero gravity.

fp.action: Commander Chen in her sleeping quarters, looking at photos of family and friends.

va.action: The International Space Station, a tiny speck of light, passing over the night side of Earth.

edit_command: Add three new shots to show Commander Chen's daily routine and her attempts to stay connected with Earth. Include a shot of her exercising, one of her conducting a science experiment, and another of her participating in a live stream with school children back on Earth.

bx.action: Commander Chen exercising on a specialized treadmill, her body tethered to the machine as she runs in zero gravity.

yz.action: Commander Chen's gloved hands carefully manipulating a complex science experiment, her face focused and intent behind her visor.

wm.action: Commander Chen, floating in front of a large screen, enthusiastically demonstrating zero-gravity experiments to a group of wide-eyed school children visible on the screen.

label.rationale: we will add three new shots to the scene to show commander chen's daily routine and her attempts to stay connected with earth. these shots will provide a more comprehensive view of her life aboard the international space station and her efforts to maintain a connection with her home planet. we'll update the json_to_edit by adding these new shots and adjusting the number_of_shots and list_display_order accordingly.

value.action: Commander Chen exercising on a specialized treadmill, her body tethered to the machine as she runs in zero gravity.
Commander Chen's gloved hands carefully manipulating a complex science experiment, her face focused and intent behind her visor.
Commander Chen, floating in front of a large screen, enthusiastically demonstrating zero-gravity experiments to a group of wide-eyed school children visible on the screen.
